price: who feared the Most Compassionate unseen[15], and came with a devoted heart.
arabic: مَّنۡ خَشِيَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَجَآءَ بِقَلۡبٖ مُّنِيبٍ
footnotes: [15] Or while he is in private.
